00033 int verbose;
00034 
00035 void
00036 printraw(const void *r, int n)
00037 {
00038     int i, l;
00039     const unsigned char *p = r;
00040     
00041     if (verbose == 0)
00042         return;
00043     while (n > 0) {
00044         l = (n > 40 ? 40 : n);
00045         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
00046             printf(" %c", (' ' <= p[i] && p[i] <= '~') ? p[i] : '.');
00047         printf("\n");
00048         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
00049             printf("%02X", p[i]);
00050         printf("\n");
00051         p += l;
00052         n -= l;
00053     }
00054 }
00055 /* Use some static data for this simple program */
00056 static unsigned char rawbuf[65536];
00057 static ssize_t rawlen;
00058 
00059 #define N_POOLS 10
00060 #define MINI_STORE_LIMIT 10
00061 struct mini_store {
00062     struct ccn_closure me;
00063     struct ccn_charbuf *cob[MINI_STORE_LIMIT];
00064 };
00065 static struct ccn_closure incoming_content_action[N_POOLS];
00066 static struct mini_store store[N_POOLS];
00067 
00068 int
00069 add_to_pool(int pool, const unsigned char *r, size_t n)
00070 {
00071     int i, j;
00072     struct ccn_charbuf **coba;
00073     
00074     coba = store[pool].cob;
00075     for (i = 0, j = 0; i < MINI_STORE_LIMIT; i++) {
00076         if (coba[i] != NULL)
00077             coba[j++] = coba[i];
00078     }
00079     for (i = j; i < MINI_STORE_LIMIT; i++)
00080         coba[i] = NULL;
00081     if (j < MINI_STORE_LIMIT) {
00082         coba[j] = ccn_charbuf_create();
00083         ccn_charbuf_append(coba[j], r, n);
00084         return(j + 1);
00085     }
00086     return(-1);
00087 }
00088 
00089 int
00090 n_pool(int pool)
00091 {
00092     int i, n;
00093     struct ccn_charbuf **coba;
00094     
00095     coba = store[pool].cob;
00096     for (i = 0, n = 0; i < MINI_STORE_LIMIT; i++)
00097         if (coba[i] != NULL)
00098             n++;
00099     return(n);
00100 }
00101 
00102 enum ccn_upcall_res
00103 incoming_content(struct ccn_closure *selfp,
00104                  enum ccn_upcall_kind kind,
00105                  struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
00106 {
00107     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_FINAL)
00108         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00109     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_INTEREST_TIMED_OUT)
00110         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_REEXPRESS);
00111     if (kind != CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT && kind != CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT_UNVERIFIED)
00112         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00113     printf("Got content matching %d components:\n", info->pi->prefix_comps);
00114     printraw(info->content_ccnb, info->pco->offset[CCN_PCO_E]);
00115     add_to_pool(selfp->intdata, info->content_ccnb, info->pco->offset[CCN_PCO_E]);
00116     return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00117 }
00118 
00119 int
00120 cob_matches(struct ccn_upcall_info *info, struct ccn_charbuf *cob)
00121 {
00122     int ans;
00123     
00124     ans = ccn_content_matches_interest(cob->buf, cob->length, 1, NULL,
00125                                        info->interest_ccnb,
00126                                        info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E],
00127                                        info->pi);
00128     return(ans);
00129 }
00130 
00131 enum ccn_upcall_res
00132 outgoing_content(struct ccn_closure *selfp,
00133                  enum ccn_upcall_kind kind,
00134                  struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
00135 {
00136     struct mini_store *md;
00137     struct ccn_charbuf *cob = NULL;
00138     int i;
00139     int res = 0;
00140     int which;
00141     
00142     md = selfp->data;
00143     which = md->me.intdata;
00144     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_FINAL) {
00145         fprintf(stderr, "CCN_UPCALL_FINAL for store %d\n", which);
00146         for (i = 0; i < MINI_STORE_LIMIT; i++)
00147             ccn_charbuf_destroy(&md->cob[i]);
00148         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00149     }
00150     printf("Store %d got interest matching %d components, kind = %d",
00151            which, info->matched_comps, kind);
00152     /* Look through our little pile of content and send one that matches */
00153     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_INTEREST) {
00154         for (i = 0; i < MINI_STORE_LIMIT; i++) {
00155             cob = md->cob[i];
00156             if (cob != NULL && cob_matches(info, cob)) {
00157                 res = ccn_put(info->h, cob->buf, cob->length);
00158                 if (res == -1) {
00159                     fprintf(stderr, "... error sending data\n");
00160                     return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00161                 }
00162                 else {
00163                     printf("... sent my content:\n");
00164                     printraw(cob->buf, cob->length);
00165                     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&md->cob[i]);
00166                     return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED);
00167                 }
00168             }
00169         }
00170         printf("... no match\n");
00171     }
00172     else
00173         printf("\n");
00174     return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00175 }
00176 
00177 #define USAGE "ccnlibtest [-hv] (pool n | flags x | prefix uri | reconnect secs | run millis | file.ccnb) ..."
00178 
00179 void
00180 usage(void)
00181 {
00182     fprintf(stderr, USAGE "\n");
00183     exit(1);
00184 }
00185 
00186 int
00187 main(int argc, char **argv)
00188 {
00189     char *arg = NULL;
00190     struct ccn *ccnH = NULL;
00191     struct ccn_parsed_interest interest = {0};
00192     struct ccn_charbuf *c = ccn_charbuf_create();
00193     struct ccn_charbuf *templ = ccn_charbuf_create();
00194     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps = ccn_indexbuf_create();
00195     int i;
00196     int millis = 0;
00197     int secs = 0;
00198     int opt;
00199     int pool = 0;
00200     int regflgs = (CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT | CCN_FORW_ACTIVE);
00201     int res;
00202     int status = 0;
00203     int val = 0;
00204     
00205     while ((opt = getopt(argc, argv, "hv")) != -1) {
00206         switch (opt) {
00207             default:
00208             case 'h':
00209                 usage();
00210                 break;
00211             case 'v':
00212                 verbose++;
00213                 break;
00214         }
00215     }
00216     argc -= optind;
00217     argv += optind;
00218     ccnH = ccn_create();
00219     if (ccn_connect(ccnH, NULL) == -1) {
00220         ccn_perror(ccnH, "ccn_connect");
00221         exit(1);
00222     }
00223     for (i = 0; i < N_POOLS; i++) {
00224         store[i].me.p = &outgoing_content;
00225         store[i].me.data = &store[i];
00226         store[i].me.intdata = i;
00227         incoming_content_action[i].p = &incoming_content;
00228         incoming_content_action[i].intdata = i;
00229     }
00230     for (i = 0; i < argc; i++) {
00231         arg = argv[i];
00232         if (0 == strcmp(arg, "reconnect")) {
00233             if (argv[i+1] == NULL)
00234                 usage();
00235             secs = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00236             if (secs <= 0 && strcmp(argv[i+1], "0") != 0)
00237                 usage();
00238             i++;
00239             ccn_disconnect(ccnH);
00240             sleep(secs);
00241             if (ccn_connect(ccnH, NULL) == -1) {
00242                 ccn_perror(ccnH, "ccn_connect");
00243                 exit(1);
00244             }
00245             continue;
00246         }
00247         if (0 == strcmp(arg, "pool")) {
00248             if (argv[i+1] == NULL)
00249                 usage();
00250             pool = argv[i+1][0] - '0';
00251             if (argv[i+1][1] || pool < 0 || pool >= N_POOLS)
00252                 usage();
00253             fprintf(stderr, "Pool %d\n", pool);
00254             i++;
00255             continue;
00256         }
00257         if (0 == strcmp(arg, "prefix")) {
00258             if (argv[i+1] == NULL)
00259                 usage();
00260             c->length = 0;
00261             res = ccn_name_from_uri(c, argv[i+1]);
00262             if (res < 0)
00263                 usage();
00264             fprintf(stderr, "Prefix ff=%#x %s pool %d\n",
00265                     regflgs, argv[i+1], pool);
00266             if (store[pool].me.intdata != pool) {
00267                 abort();
00268             }
00269             res = ccn_set_interest_filter_with_flags(ccnH, c, &store[pool].me, regflgs);
00270             if (res < 0) {
00271                 ccn_perror(ccnH, "ccn_set_interest_filter_with_flags");
00272                 status = 1;
00273             }
00274             res = ccn_run(ccnH, 2);
00275             if (res < 0)
00276                 break;
00277             i++;
00278             continue;
00279         }
00280         if (0 == strcmp(arg, "flags")) {
00281             if (argv[i+1] == NULL)
00282                 usage();
00283             regflgs = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00284             if (regflgs <= 0 && strcmp(argv[i+1], "0") != 0)
00285                 usage();
00286             i++;
00287             continue;
00288         }
00289         if (0 == strcmp(arg, "mincob")) {
00290             if (argv[i+1] == NULL)
00291                 usage();
00292             val = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00293             if (val <= 0 && strcmp(argv[i+1], "0") != 0)
00294                 usage();
00295             i++;
00296             if (n_pool(pool) < val) {
00297                 fprintf(stderr, "Pool %d has %d cobs, expected at least %d\n",
00298                         pool, n_pool(pool), val);
00299                 exit(1);
00300             }
00301             continue;
00302         }
00303         if (0 == strcmp(arg, "maxcob")) {
00304             if (argv[i+1] == NULL)
00305                 usage();
00306             val = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00307             if (val <= 0 && strcmp(argv[i+1], "0") != 0)
00308                 usage();
00309             i++;
00310             if (n_pool(pool) > val) {
00311                 fprintf(stderr, "Pool %d has %d cobs, expected at most %d\n",
00312                         pool, n_pool(pool), val);
00313                 exit(1);
00314             }
00315             continue;
00316         }
00317         if (0 == strcmp(arg, "run")) {
00318             if (argv[i+1] == NULL)
00319                 usage();
00320             millis = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00321             if (millis <= 0 && strcmp(argv[i+1], "0") != 0)
00322                 usage();
00323             i++;
00324             res = ccn_run(ccnH, millis);
00325             if (res < 0) {
00326                 ccn_perror(ccnH, "ccn_run");
00327                 exit(1);
00328             }
00329             continue;
00330         }
00331         close(0);
00332         res = open(arg, O_RDONLY);
00333         if (res != 0) {
00334             perror(arg);
00335             exit(1);
00336         }
00337         fprintf(stderr, "Reading %s ... ", arg);
00338         rawlen = read(0, rawbuf, sizeof(rawbuf));
00339         if (rawlen < 0) {
00340             perror("skipping");
00341             // XXX - status
00342             continue;
00343         }
00344         // XXX - Should do a skeleton check before parse
00345         res = ccn_parse_interest(rawbuf, rawlen, &interest, NULL);
00346         if (res >= 0) {
00347             size_t name_start = interest.offset[CCN_PI_B_Name];
00348             size_t name_size = interest.offset[CCN_PI_E_Name] - name_start;
00349             templ->length = 0;
00350             ccn_charbuf_append(templ, rawbuf, rawlen);
00351             fprintf(stderr, "Expressing interest with %d name components\n", res);
00352             c->length = 0;
00353             ccn_charbuf_append(c, rawbuf + name_start, name_size);
00354             // XXX - res is currently ignored
00355             ccn_express_interest(ccnH, c, &(incoming_content_action[pool]), templ);
00356         }
00357         else {
00358             struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject obj = {0};
00359             int try;
00360             res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(rawbuf, rawlen, &obj, comps);
00361             if (res >= 0) {
00362                 for (try = 0; try < 5; try++) {
00363                     res = add_to_pool(pool, rawbuf, rawlen);
00364                     if (res >= 0) {
00365                         fprintf(stderr, "Added to pool %d\n", pool);
00366                         break;
00367                     }
00368                     if (try == 5) {
00369                         fprintf(stderr, "No buffer for %s\n", arg);
00370                         status = 1;
00371                         break;
00372                     }
00373                     fprintf(stderr, "Pool %d full - wait for drain\n", pool);
00374                     if (ccn_run(ccnH, 1000) < 0)
00375                         break;
00376                 }
00377                 res = ccn_run(ccnH, 10);
00378             }
00379             else {
00380                 fprintf(stderr, "What is that?\n");
00381                 status = 1;
00382             }
00383         }
00384         res = ccn_run(ccnH, 10);
00385         if (res < 0) {
00386             ccn_perror(ccnH, "oops");
00387             status = 1;
00388         }
00389     }
00390     res = ccn_run(ccnH, 10);
00391     if (res < 0)
00392         status = 1;
00393     ccn_destroy(&ccnH);
00394     exit(status);
00395 }
